Symptoms: Runny nose, sore throat, cough, congestion

Treatments: Rest, fluids, antiviral medications (if severe), over-the-counter pain and fever relievers

Symptoms: Head pain, sensitivity to light or sound

Treatments: Gargling with warm salt water, throat lozenges, pain relievers
BRAT diet (bananas, rice, applesauce, toast), fluids, over-the-counter antidiarrheal meds
Cool compresses, moisturizers, aloe vera gel
Establishing a bedtime routine, relaxation techniques, cognitive-behavioral therapy

Symptoms: Sneezing, runny or stuffy nose, itchy eyes

Treatments: Rest, ice packs, compression, elevation (RICE), pain relievers
Gentle cleansers, topical treatments (benzoyl peroxide, salicylic acid), avoiding triggers
